The British School of Guangzhou Part of The British Schools Group
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Can we please remind you that if your child needs to take medication during the day that you send the medicine in a sealed bag or container clearly labelled with your child's name and class. It is recommended that you pass all medicines directly to your child's bus supervisor or Miss Patience on the front desk.
In addition to this we ask that you also complete the attached 'medicine approval' form to ensure our school nurse is fully informed regarding the administration of the medicine.
If your child needs to take any medication for a contagious condition please keep them at home until they are fully recovered.
Thank you for your support with this.
Miss Kathy
Head of Lower School The British School of Guangzhou World Class Education
